name: 卡米拉·格林伯格
name_full: 卡米拉·格林伯格 Camila Greenberg

last_movies.title: 好汉两个半 第十一季
老爸老妈的浪漫史 第四季
犯罪现场调查 第八季

introduction: Overview (1)Date of Birth	26 May 1988, Tucson, Arizona, USAMini Bio (1)Camila Briann Greenberg was born and raised in Tucson, AZ to Dr. Jeff Greenberg, a social psychology professor at U of A, and Dr. Liz Greenberg, a Nursing professor at NAU. Camila decided at the age of five she was an artist on a mission and began modeling, acting, singing, and dancing right away. At the age of eleven, Ford modeling agency discovered her and soon after, she was working on a local access TV show in Pheonix, AZ with Glee's Max Adler. When Camila was 17 yrs of age, she was offered a contract with an agency in LA and jumped at the chance! Within six months of living in Los Angeles, Camila starred in a Nickelodeon TV pilot with Tim Stack. She then appeared in numerous TV series before her desire for more education took over. Camila took classes at SMC for two years, studying psychology, creative writing, and nutrition. She started a volunteer organization with Ally Iseman called Cards for Humanity, where they visit nursing homes to play games and connect with residents. Camila ran the organization for a year, with weekly visits to homes before her English professor encouraged her to return to her artistic roots in the entertainment industry. Camila then started performing spoken word around Los Angeles in between acting jobs. Camila believes the art of acting can bring the world to a higher level of consciousness, and heal the hearts of all humans.
